topic.title: ZeroVoat now with url search and sorting options
topic.body:
* Sorting options by last topics, activity and votes
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1J1c7eML6uMwDU4uiKbKRxoqxGP6WMFMvb/

* Search now in top header, can be executed via Enter, url is shareable, e.g.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1J1c7eML6uMwDU4uiKbKRxoqxGP6WMFMvb/index.html?v=search+id=doge
